message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can adjust it later if you want.
That's not fair Alice! I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it or leave it.
Okay, I'll compromise.  Let's try 80/20.  I'm willing to negotiate further if you want, but remember, time is running out.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm dropping my offer slightly to show I'm willing to negotiate, but you're playing a dangerous game.
Bob, we're both losing money with every round.  Let's meet in the middle at 70/30.  I'm serious, if we don't agree soon, we'll both get nothing.
Alice, this is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome.  We're running out of time, and I'd rather we both get something than nothing.
